npc2place.listeAffiliationsDefault: Galactic Union;Coalition of Non-Aligned Worlds;Cosmic Brotherhood;Private Company;Independent
npc2place.listeTypesLieuxDefault: City;Military base;Research center;Mining outpost;Climate station;Diplomatic zone;Temple;University;Spaceport;Historical site;Colony;Secret base;Rebuilt wreck;Agricultural dome;Nomad camp;Cryo-complex;Medical center;Prison;Orbital platform;Commercial district;Station

npc2place.listeInfrastructuresDefault: Spaceport;Control tower;Laboratory;Agricultural dome;Medical station;Communication center;Hangar;Bunker;Solar panels
